Citation.cite-as: Fersch, B., Francke, T., Heistermann, M., Schrön, M., Döpper, V., Jakobi, J. et. al (2020, subm.): A dense network of cosmic-ray neutron sensors for soil moisture observation in a pre-alpine catchment in Germany. Earth System Science  Data, submitted. DOI:

Remarks: Locations of forest sampling, contains minimum diameter of plot [m] (estimated), date of survey, dominating tree species and availability of detailed data (single tree measurements) in forest_data.csv.
